title: Is It Bannable to PLay with a custom skin
body: I just need to know if it is bannable to be playing with a custom skin in game. I have read that people say as long as it doesn't alter the gameplay and give u an unfair advantage it is ok and riot doesn't care is this true? Thank You for your feedback

replies.body: We don't support any third party modifications or third parties.  We aren't banning for custom skins right now, but we could change that stance at any time.  You are also responsible if any malicious content is hiding within those programs, and we wouldn't be able to offer you support.  It would be in your best interest to stay cautious!
Ok, Thank you, what if the skin is kinda like one of your skins that riot has made but it was player made? Is it still ok to play with or will we be banned?
